nodes.text: Farren Dulz was a male Sullustan living during the Galactic War. Around 3642 BBY he was stationed in Aurek Base on Hoth until White Maw pirates attacked and stole the signal jammers, turning them against the Republic. As there were not enough troops to reclaim all lost jammers, Dulz instead asked a Republic citizen to destroy them so that White Maw could not use them.
Farren Dulz appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Hoth, who starts the mission "Cutting Our Losses."
